titles.title: SAFE Bridges Act of 2015
Strengthen And Fortify Existing Bridges Act of 2015
A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to assist States to rehabilitate or replace certain bridges, and for other purposes.
SAFE Bridges Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Strengthen And Fortify Existing Bridges Act of 2015 or the SAFE Bridges Act of 2015
This bill directs the Department of Transportation to establish a program to assist states to rehabilitate or replace bridges found to be structurally deficient, functionally obsolete, or fracture critical.
States shall use apportioned program funds for projects to rehabilitate and replace such bridges.
The federal share of project costs is 100%.
